<h3 id="X31806">X(31806) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS AND INNER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^4-(b+c)*(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+(2*b^4+2*c^4+(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*b*c)*a^2+(b^3+c^3)*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^3+c^3))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31806) = X(4)-3*X(5692) = 2*X(5)-3*X(10176) = 3*X(72)-X(14872) = 4*X(140)-3*X(5883) = 3*X(376)-X(15071) = 3*X(392)-2*X(13464) = 3*X(549)-2*X(5885) = 3*X(551)-4*X(31838) = 5*X(631)-3*X(5902) = 2*X(942)-3*X(10165) = 6*X(3740)-5*X(31399) = 4*X(5044)-3*X(10175) = 3*X(5657)-X(5903) = 3*X(5692)-2*X(20117) = 3*X(5694)-X(31828) = X(5697)+3*X(15104) = 2*X(7686)-3*X(10175) = X(12245)-3*X(15104) = 3*X(14110)+X(14872) = 3*X(31803)-2*X(31828)</b>
<p>X(31806) lies on these lines:
{1,201}, {3,758}, {4,5692}, {5,10}, {8,6840}, {20,3648}, {30,5694}, {40,78}, {63,5450}, {65,5432}, {72,515}, {79,6951}, {104,6763}, {140,5883}, {191,5538}, {214,26286}, {255,11700}, {329,6256}, {355,3678}, {376,15071}, {392,13464}, {404,5535}, {497,5697}, {498,3485}, {511,31825}, {516,5887}, {518,5882}, {519,28459}, {549,5885}, {550,2771}, {551,31838}, {631,5442}, {912,4067}, {942,10165}, {944,5904}, {962,6894}, {993,26921}, {997,5709}, {1001,1482}, {1125,24474}, {1158,6282}, {1385,3874}, {1735,22072}, {1765,3958}, {1844,7531}, {1858,4304}, {1938,15584}, {2095,25524}, {2392,10625}, {2646,18389}, {2689,2744}, {2772,10575}, {2778,2883}, {2779,5562}, {2801,4127}, {2802,19914}, {3057,28234}, {3072,30115}, {3336,6940}, {3428,5730}, {3486,18397}, {3523,15016}, {3526,3833}, {3555,13607}, {3576,3868}, {3579,14988}, {3587,12520}, {3612,21165}, {3647,6914}, {3654,25413}, {3681,5881}, {3754,26446}, {3876,5587}, {3877,5047}, {3881,10246}, {3890,16200}, {3892,15178}, {3894,30389}, {3898,24680}, {3899,7991}, {3901,7987}, {3927,12114}, {3940,11500}, {3984,17857}, {3988,18525}, {4005,18908}, {4015,5790}, {4084,10164}, {4511,11012}, {4867,21740}, {4880,26877}, {4999,5771}, {5223,12650}, {5251,26878}, {5289,22770}, {5446,15049}, {5506,11531}, {5552,6960}, {5572,31792}, {5603,5659}, {5755,25078}, {5758,26332}, {5761,10198}, {5777,31673}, {5794,5812}, {5894,6001}, {6244,18237}, {6831,21677}, {6864,16134}, {6883,30143}, {6909,11684}, {6917,16125}, {6922,10265}, {7280,11570}, {7411,16132}, {7508,22937}, {7957,12672}, {8127,18409}, {8128,18408}, {8666,11715}, {9614,12758}, {10157,16616}, {10609,30264}, {11249,30144}, {11499,12702}, {12119,12532}, {12359,13605}, {12559,18443}, {12688,28150}, {12704,19861}, {12736,24914}, {13624,24475}, {13754,31817}, {15064,18480}, {15558,30323}, {17768,31775}, {18412,21168}, {18589,18638}, {22076,27687}, {30329,31658}</p>
<p>
X(31806) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 5693}, {40, 3869}, {72, 14110}, {944, 5904}, {4067, 4297}, {5697, 12245}, {7957, 12672}, {12119, 12532}<br>
X(31806) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 20117), (10, 31837), (65, 6684), (355, 3678), (946, 960), (1482, 3884), (3555, 13607), (3868, 12005), (3874, 1385), (5882, 31786), (5884, 3), (7686, 5044), (18480, 31835), (24474, 1125), (24475, 13624), (30329, 31658), (31673, 5777), (31730, 31793), (31803, 5694)<br>
X(31806) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 5692, 20117), (5044, 7686, 10175)<br>
</p>
